title: Sweetcorn Relish
ingredients: ['1.2kg sweetcorn', '350g cabbage, chopped', '160g onion, chopped', '150g green pepper, chopped', '150g red pepper, chopped', '200g caster sugar', '2 tablespoons ground dry mustard', '1 tablespoon celery seeds', '1 tablespoon mustard seeds', '1 tablespoon salt', '1 tablespoon ground turmeric', '1 litre apple cider vinegar', '250ml water']
